text: Emmy Eerdmans (30 August 1931 â€“ 15 December 2024) was a Dutch painter, draughtsman and sculptor. Eerdmans was a member of among others Arti et Amicitiae. She won in 1957 the and she won the the 1957 Prix de Rome in the painting category. In the sculpture category she finished second. Eerdmans married to bronze caster, sculptor and graphic artist . She died on 15 December 2024, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:Dutch painters Category:Dutch sculptors Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from North Holland Category:Place of death missing
